trans-unit.source: Individual proxies are represented by the QNetworkProxy class, which is used to describe and configure the connection to a proxy. Proxy types which operate on different levels of network communication are supported, with SOCKS 5 support allowing proxying of network traffic at a low level, and HTTP and FTP proxying working at the protocol level. See QNetworkProxy::ProxyType for more information.
trans-unit.target: 各个代理由QNetworkProxy类表示，该类用于描述和配置与代理的连接。支持在不同网络通信级别上运行的代理类型，SOCKS 5支持允许在较低级别上代理网络流量，而HTTP和FTP代理则在协议级别上工作。有关更多信息，请参见QNetworkProxy :: ProxyType。

trans-unit.source: Information about the items selected in a view is stored in an instance of the QItemSelectionModel class. This maintains model indexes for items in a single model, and is independent of any views. Since there can be many views onto a model, it is possible to share selections between views, allowing applications to show multiple views in a consistent way.

trans-unit.source: Informs the window system that when maximizing the window it should use as much of the available screen geometry as possible, including areas that may be covered by system UI such as status bars or application launchers. This may result in the window being placed under these system UIs, but does not guarantee it, depending on whether or not the platform supports it. When the flag is enabled the user is responsible for taking QScreen::availableGeometry() into account, so that any UI elements in the application that require user interaction are not covered by system UI.
trans-unit.target: 通知窗口系统，当最大化窗口时，它应使用尽可能多的可用屏幕几何图形，包括系统UI可能覆盖的区域，例如状态栏或应用程序启动器。这可能会导致窗口被放置在这些系统UI之下，但是并不能保证窗口，具体取决于平台是否支持它。启用该标志时，用户负责将QScreen :: availableGeometry（）考虑在内，以便应用程序中需要用户交互的任何UI元素都不会被系统UI覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Inline Components
Inline citation
trans-unit.target: 内联引用

trans-unit.source: Inline components share all the characteristics of regular top-level components and use the same import list as their containing QML document.
trans-unit.target: 内联组件具有常规顶级组件的所有特征，并使用与其包含的QML文档相同的 import 列表。

trans-unit.source: Inline images are added to documents through the cursor in the usual manner. Unlike many other elements, all of the image properties are specified by the image's format. This means that a QTextImageFormat object has to be created before an image can be inserted:
trans-unit.target: 内联图像以常规方式通过光标添加到文档中。与许多其他元素不同，所有图像属性均由图像格式指定。这意味着必须先创建QTextImageFormat对象，然后才能插入图像：

trans-unit.source: Inline images are inserted with insertImage(). The image to be used can be specified in an image format, or by name.
trans-unit.target: 内嵌图像通过insertImage（）插入。可以以图像格式或名称指定要使用的图像。

trans-unit.source: Inline images are represented by a Unicode value U+FFFC (OBJECT REPLACEMENT CHARACTER) which has an associated QTextImageFormat. The image format specifies a name with setName() that is used to locate the image. The size of the rectangle that the image will occupy is specified in pixels using setWidth() and setHeight(). The desired image quality may be set with setQuality().
trans-unit.target: 内联图像由Unicode值U + FFFC（对象替换字符）表示，该值具有关联的QTextImageFormat。图像格式使用setName（）指定用于查找图像的名称。使用setWidth（）和setHeight（）以像素为单位指定图像将占据的矩形的大小。可以使用setQuality（）设置所需的图像质量。

trans-unit.source: Inline images are represented by a Unicode value U+FFFC (OBJECT REPLACEMENT CHARACTER) which has an associated QTextImageFormat. The image format specifies a name with setName() that is used to locate the image. The size of the rectangle that the image will occupy is specified in pixels using setWidth() and setHeight(). The desired image quality may be set with setQuality().

trans-unit.source: Input is accepected but invalid if it contains a double that is outside the range or is in the wrong format; e.g. with too many digits after the decimal point or is empty.
trans-unit.target: 输入被接受,但如果包含超出范围的双数或格式错误,例如小数点后的数字太多或为空,则无效。

trans-unit.source: Input is accepted if it contains a double that is within the valid range and is in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入中包含的双数在有效范围内且格式正确,则接受输入。

trans-unit.source: Input is rejected if it is not a double.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是双数,则拒绝输入。

trans-unit.source: Input method events are sent to widgets when an input method is used to enter text into a widget. Input methods are widely used to enter text for languages with non-Latin alphabets.
trans-unit.target: 当使用输入法向小组件输入文本时,输入法事件被发送到小组件。输入法广泛用于输入非拉丁字母语言的文本。

trans-unit.source: Input method hints are only relevant for input items. The hints are used by the input method to indicate how it should operate. For example, if the Qt::ImhNumbersOnly flag is set, the input method may change its visual components to reflect that only numbers can be entered.
trans-unit.target: 输入法提示只与输入项有关。这些提示被输入法用来指示它应该如何操作。例如,如果设置了Qt::ImhNumbersOnly标志,输入法可能会改变它的视觉组件,以反映只能输入数字。

trans-unit.source: Input method resets automatically when the focused editor changes.
trans-unit.target: 当重点编辑器发生变化时,输入法自动复位。

trans-unit.source: Input method visibility remains false for devices with no virtual keyboards.
trans-unit.target: 对于没有虚拟键盘的设备,输入法可见性仍然为假。

trans-unit.source: Input-Only Slots
trans-unit.target: 纯输入插槽

trans-unit.source: Input-and-output
trans-unit.target: Input-and-output

trans-unit.source: Input-only
trans-unit.target: Input-only

trans-unit.source: Input-only slots are normal slots that take parameters passed by value or by constant reference. However, unlike asynchronous slots, the caller is usually waiting for completion of the callee before resuming operation. Therefore, non-asynchronous slots should not block or should state it its documentation that they may do so.
trans-unit.target: 纯输入插槽是普通的插槽,接受通过值或常量引用传递的参数。但是,与异步槽不同的是,调用者通常是在等待被调用者完成后才恢复操作。因此,非异步槽不应该阻塞,或者应该在其文档中说明可能会阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Input-only slots have no special marking in their signature, except that they take only parameters passed by value or by constant reference. Optionally, slots can take a QDBusMessage parameter as a last parameter, which can be used to perform additional analysis of the method call message.
trans-unit.target: 仅输入插槽在其签名中没有特殊标记，只是它们仅接受通过值或常量引用传递的参数。 （可选）插槽可以将QDBusMessage参数用作最后一个参数，该参数可用于对方法调用消息进行附加分析。

trans-unit.source: Inside the innerConeAngle, the spot light behaves similarly to the point light. There the light intensity diminishes according to inverse-square-law. However, the fade-off (and range) can be controlled with the constantFade, linearFade, and quadraticFade properties.

trans-unit.source: Installing an event filter on QCoreApplication::instance(). Such an event filter is able to process all events for all widgets, so it's just as powerful as reimplementing notify(); furthermore, it's possible to have more than one application-global event filter. Global event filters even see mouse events for disabled widgets. Note that application event filters are only called for objects that live in the main thread.
trans-unit.target: 在QCoreApplication :: instance（）上安装事件过滤器。这样的事件过滤器能够处理所有小部件的所有事件，因此它与重新实现notify（）一样强大。此外，可能有多个应用程序全局事件过滤器。全局事件过滤器甚至可以查看禁用小部件的鼠标事件。请注意，仅针对驻留在主线程中的对象调用应用程序事件过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Installing or removing a QTranslator, or changing an installed QTranslator generates a LanguageChange event for the QCoreApplication instance. A QApplication instance will propagate the event to all toplevel widgets, where a reimplementation of changeEvent can re-translate the user interface by passing user-visible strings via the tr() function to the respective property setters. User-interface classes generated by Qt Designer provide a retranslateUi() function that can be called.
trans-unit.target: 安装或卸下QTranslator或更改已安装的QTranslator会为QCoreApplication实例生成LanguageChange事件。一个QApplication实例会将事件传播到所有顶级小部件，在其中，changeEvent的重新实现可以通过将用户可见的字符串通过tr（）函数传递给各个属性设置器来重新转换用户界面。由Qt Designer生成的用户界面类提供了可以调用的 retranslateUi() 函数。

trans-unit.source: Integers in QCborValue are limited to the range of the qint64 type. That is, from -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 (-263) to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 (263 - 1). CBOR itself can represent integer values outside of this range, which QCborValue does not support. When decoding a stream using fromCbor() containing one of those values, QCborValue will convert automatically to Double, but that may lose up to 11 bits of precision.
trans-unit.target: QCborValue中的整数限制为qint64类型的范围。也就是说，从-9,223,372,036,854,775,808（-2 63）9,223,372,036,854,775,807（2 63 - 1）。CBOR本身可以表示超出此范围的整数值，QCborValue不支持该整数值。当使用包含这些值之一的fromCbor（）解码流时，QCborValue将自动转换为Double，但这可能会损失多达11位的精度。

trans-unit.source: Integers in QCborValue are limited to the range of the qint64 type. That is, from -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 (-263) to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 (263 - 1). CBOR itself can represent integer values outside of this range, which QCborValue does not support. When decoding a stream using fromCbor() containing one of those values, QCborValue will convert automatically to Double, but that may lose up to 11 bits of precision.

trans-unit.source: Interfaces are similar to C++ abstract classes and Java's interface keyword and declare the "contract" that is established between caller and callee. That is, they establish the names of the methods, signals and properties that are available as well as the behavior that is expected from either side when communication is established.

trans-unit.source: Internal and external transitions behave the same, except for the case of a transition whose source state is a compound state and whose target(s) is a descendant of the source. In such a case, an internal transition will not exit and re-enter its source state, while an external one will.
trans-unit.target: 内部和外部转换的行为是一样的,但如果一个转换的源状态是一个复合状态,而其目标状态是源状态的后裔,则例外。在这种情况下,内部转换不会退出和重新进入它的源态,而外部转换会。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QHash uses a hash table to perform lookups. This hash table automatically grows and shrinks to provide fast lookups without wasting too much memory. You can still control the size of the hash table by calling reserve() if you already know approximately how many items the QHash will contain, but this isn't necessary to obtain good performance. You can also call capacity() to retrieve the hash table's size.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，QHash使用哈希表执行查找。该哈希表会自动增长和缩小以提供快速查找，而不会浪费太多内存。如果您已经知道QHash大约包含多少个项目，仍然可以通过调用reserve（）来控制哈希表的大小，但这不是获得良好性能的必要条件。您还可以调用Capacity（）来检索哈希表的大小。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QList<T> is represented as an array of T if sizeof(T) <= sizeof(void*) and T has been declared to be either a Q_MOVABLE_TYPE or a Q_PRIMITIVE_TYPE using Q_DECLARE_TYPEINFO. Otherwise, QList<T> is represented as an array of T* and the items are allocated on the heap.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，如果 sizeof(T) <= sizeof(void*) 并且使用Q_DECLARE_TYPEINFO声明T为 Q_MOVABLE_TYPE 或 Q_PRIMITIVE_TYPE ，则QList <T>表示为T的数组。否则，QList <T>表示为T *的数组，并且各项在堆上分配。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QNetworkAccessManager may open multiple connections to a server, in order to allow it process requests in parallel. These connections may be reused, which means that the encrypted() signal would not be emitted. This means that you are only guaranteed to receive this signal for the first connection to a site in the lifespan of the QNetworkAccessManager.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，QNetworkAccessManager可以打开与服务器的多个连接，以便允许它并行处理请求。这些连接可以重用，这意味着不会发出crypto（）信号。这意味着您只能保证在QNetworkAccessManager使用寿命内首次连接到站点时会收到此信号。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QSet uses a hash table to perform lookups. The hash table automatically grows and shrinks to provide fast lookups without wasting memory. You can still control the size of the hash table by calling reserve(), if you already know approximately how many elements the QSet will contain, but this isn't necessary to obtain good performance. You can also call capacity() to retrieve the hash table's size.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，QSet使用哈希表执行查找。哈希表会自动增长和收缩，以提供快速查找而不会浪费内存。如果您已经知道QSet大约包含多少个元素，则仍然可以通过调用reserve（）来控制哈希表的大小，但这不是获得良好性能所必需的。您还可以调用Capacity（）来检索哈希表的大小。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QSslCertificate is stored as an X509 structure. You can access this handle by calling handle(), but the results are likely to not be portable.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，QSslCertificate存储为X509结构。您可以通过调用handle（）来访问此句柄，但是结果可能无法移植。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QTextStream uses a Unicode based buffer, and QTextCodec is used by QTextStream to automatically support different character sets. By default, QTextCodec::codecForLocale() is used for reading and writing, but you can also set the codec by calling setCodec(). Automatic Unicode detection is also supported. When this feature is enabled (the default behavior), QTextStream will detect the UTF-16 or the UTF-32 BOM (Byte Order Mark) and switch to the appropriate UTF codec when reading. QTextStream does not write a BOM by default, but you can enable this by calling setGenerateByteOrderMark(true). When QTextStream operates on a QString directly, the codec is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，QTextStream使用基于Unicode缓冲器，并且QTextCodec来用于由QTextStream自动支持不同的字符集。默认情况下，QTextCodec :: codecForLocale（）用于读取和写入，但是您也可以通过调用setCodec（）来设置编解码器。还支持自动Unicode检测。启用此功能（默认行为）后，QTextStream将检测UTF-16或UTF-32 BOM（字节顺序标记），并在读取时切换到适当的UTF编解码器。QTextStream默认情况下不编写BOM，但是您可以通过调用setGenerateByteOrderMark（true）来启用它。当QTextStream直接在QString上操作，禁用编解码器。

trans-unit.source: Internally, CBOR booleans are represented by a pair of types, one for true and one for false. For that reason, boolean QCborValues will return true for isSimpleType() and one of isSimpleType(QCborSimpleType::False) or isSimpleType(QCborSimpleType::True).
trans-unit.target: 在内部，CBOR布尔值由一对类型表示，一种表示true，一种表示false。因此，布尔值QCborValues将为isSimpleType（）和 isSimpleType(QCborSimpleType::False) 或 isSimpleType(QCborSimpleType::True) 一个返回true 。

trans-unit.source: Internally, QHash uses a hash table to perform lookups. This hash table automatically grows and shrinks to provide fast lookups without wasting too much memory. You can still control the size of the hash table by calling reserve() if you already know approximately how many items the QHash will contain, but this isn't necessary to obtain good performance. You can also call capacity() to retrieve the hash table's size.

Internally, QList<T> is represented as an array of T if sizeof(T) <= sizeof(void*) and T has been declared to be either a Q_MOVABLE_TYPE or a Q_PRIMITIVE_TYPE using Q_DECLARE_TYPEINFO. Otherwise, QList<T> is represented as an array of T* and the items are allocated on the heap.

Internally, QSet uses a hash table to perform lookups. The hash table automatically grows and shrinks to provide fast lookups without wasting memory. You can still control the size of the hash table by calling reserve(), if you already know approximately how many elements the QSet will contain, but this isn't necessary to obtain good performance. You can also call capacity() to retrieve the hash table's size.
Internally, QSslCertificate is stored as an X509 structure. You can access this handle by calling handle(), but the results are likely to not be portable.

Internally, QTextStream uses a Unicode based buffer, and QTextCodec is used by QTextStream to automatically support different character sets. By default, QTextCodec::codecForLocale() is used for reading and writing, but you can also set the codec by calling setCodec(). Automatic Unicode detection is also supported. When this feature is enabled (the default behavior), QTextStream will detect the UTF-16 or the UTF-32 BOM (Byte Order Mark) and switch to the appropriate UTF codec when reading. QTextStream does not write a BOM by default, but you can enable this by calling setGenerateByteOrderMark(true). When QTextStream operates on a QString directly, the codec is disabled.

Internally, a MapCircle is implemented as a many-sided polygon. To calculate the radius points it uses a spherical model of the Earth, similar to the atDistanceAndAzimuth method of the coordinate type. These two things can occasionally have implications for the accuracy of the circle's shape, depending on position and map projection.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，MapCircle被实现为多面多边形。要计算半径点，它使用地球的球形模型，类似于坐标类型的atDistanceAndAzimuth方法。取决于位置和地图投影，这两件事有时可能会影响圆的形状精度。

trans-unit.source: Internally, a MapCircle is implemented as a many-sided polygon. To calculate the radius points it uses a spherical model of the Earth, similar to the atDistanceAndAzimuth method of the coordinate type. These two things can occasionally have implications for the accuracy of the circle's shape, depending on position and map projection.

trans-unit.source: It affects the locations into which test programs might write files: GenericDataLocation, DataLocation, ConfigLocation, GenericConfigLocation, AppConfigLocation, GenericCacheLocation, and CacheLocation. Other locations are not affected.

It allows (z axis) rotation to be relative to an arbitrary point, and also provides a way to specify 3D-like rotations for Items. This gives more control over item rotation than the rotation property.
trans-unit.target: 它允许（z轴）旋转相对于任意点，并且还提供一种方法来为Items指定类似3D的旋转。与旋转属性相比，这可以更好地控制项目旋转。

trans-unit.source: It allows a QML class connect to another Bluetooth device and exchange strings with it. Data is sent and received using a QDataStream object allowing type safe transfers of QStrings. QDataStream is a well known format and can be decoded by non-Qt applications. Note that for the ease of use, BluetoothSocket is only well suited for use with strings. If you want to use a binary protocol for your application's communication you should consider using its C++ counterpart QBluetoothSocket.
trans-unit.target: 它允许QML类连接到另一个Bluetooth设备并与其交换字符串。使用QDataStream对象发送和接收数据，该对象允许QString的类型安全传输。QDataStream是一种众所周知的格式，并且可以由非Qt应用程序解码。请注意，为了易于使用，BluetoothSocket仅非常适合与字符串一起使用。如果要使用二进制协议进行应用程序的通信，则应考虑使用其C ++对应的QBluetoothSocket。

trans-unit.source: It allows a QML class connect to another Bluetooth device and exchange strings with it. Data is sent and received using a QDataStream object allowing type safe transfers of QStrings. QDataStream is a well known format and can be decoded by non-Qt applications. Note that for the ease of use, BluetoothSocket is only well suited for use with strings. If you want to use a binary protocol for your application's communication you should consider using its C++ counterpart QBluetoothSocket.
It allows a QML project to get information about a remote service, or describe a service for a BluetoothSocket to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 它允许QML项目获取有关远程服务的信息，或描述要与BluetoothSocket连接的服务。

trans-unit.source: It allows different scaling values for the x and y axes, and allows the scale to be relative to an arbitrary point. This gives more control over item scaling than the scale property.
trans-unit.target: 它允许x和y轴使用不同的缩放值，并允许缩放相对于任意点。与scale属性相比，这提供了对项目缩放的更多控制。

trans-unit.source: It allows for a combination of rotation, scale, translatation and shearing by using just one tranformation provided in a 4x4-matrix.
trans-unit.target: 它只需使用4x4矩阵中提供的一个转形,就可以实现旋转、缩放、平移和剪切的组合。

trans-unit.source: It also contains a hint to the renderer if this attribute is the attribute describing the position. The scene graph renderer may use this information to perform optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个属性是描述位置的属性,它还包含对渲染器的提示。场景图渲染器可以使用这些信息来进行优化。

trans-unit.source: It also contains some functions to ease the process of implementing different authentication flows.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含一些功能,以方便实现不同的认证流的过程。

trans-unit.source: It also contains some helper functions to check if a version supports profiles or is a legacy version.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含一些帮助函数,用于检查版本是否支持配置文件或遗留版本。

trans-unit.source: It also serves as the default text in menus and tooltips if the action has not been defined with setText() or setToolTip(), and will also be used in toolbar buttons if no icon has been defined using setIcon().
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未使用setText（）或setToolTip（）定义动作，它也可用作菜单和工具提示中的默认文本，如果尚未使用setIcon（）定义图标，它也将在工具栏按钮中使用。

trans-unit.source: It also skips any tear-down or tidy-up that was supposed to happen at the end of the test, and might therefore leave the workspace in an untidy state, which might cause complications for further tests.
It also supports changing the acceleration mode, which controls whether the force of gravity is included in the accelerometer values or not.
trans-unit.target: 它还支持改变加速模式,控制重力是否包含在加速度计的数值中。

trans-unit.source: It also supports multi-homing, meaning that a connected endpoint can have alternate IP addresses associated with it in order to route around network failure or changing conditions.
trans-unit.target: 它还支持多宿主,即连接的端点可以拥有与之相关联的备用IP地址,以绕过网络故障或变化的条件进行路由。

trans-unit.source: It also works for any decimal values, 0.041 is increased to 0.042 by stepping once.
trans-unit.target: 它也适用于任何小数值,0.041通过踩踏一次增加到0.042。

trans-unit.source: It applies this transformation to
trans-unit.target: 它将这种转变应用于

trans-unit.source: It backs QOffscreenSurface with standard EGL pbuffer surfaces (by default this is disabled and a gbm surface is used instead).

It bears repeating that the implementation of qHashBits() - like the qHash() overloads offered by Qt - may change at any time. You must not rely on the fact that qHashBits() will give the same results (for the same inputs) across different Qt versions.
trans-unit.target: 需要重复的是，qHashBits（）的实现（如Qt提供的qHash（）重载）可能随时更改。您不能依赖于这样的事实，即qHashBits（）在不同的Qt版本之间将给出相同的结果（对于相同的输入）。

trans-unit.source: It bears repeating that the implementation of qHashRange() - like the qHash() overloads offered by Qt - may change at any time. You must not rely on the fact that qHashRange() will give the same results (for the same inputs) across different Qt versions, even if qHash() for the element type would.
trans-unit.target: 需要重复的是，qHashRange（）的实现（如Qt提供的qHash（）重载）可能随时更改。您不能依赖qHashRange（）在不同的Qt版本之间会给出相同结果（对于相同的输入）的事实，即使元素类型的qHash（）也可以。

trans-unit.source: It bears repeating that the implementation of qHashRangeCommutative() - like the qHash() overloads offered by Qt - may change at any time. You must not rely on the fact that qHashRangeCommutative() will give the same results (for the same inputs) across different Qt versions, even if qHash() for the element type would.
trans-unit.target: 需要重复的是，qHashRangeCommutative（）的实现（如Qt提供的qHash（）重载）可能随时更改。你不能在不同的Qt版本依靠事实qHashRangeCommutative（）可以得到同样的结果（相同的输入），即使qHash（）用于将元素类型。

trans-unit.source: It builds upon the API concepts and types in the QML Positioning API. A more hands-on introduction of the Maps and Navigation types can be found in the Maps and Navigation tutorial.
It builds upon the API concepts and types in the QML Positioning API. A more hands-on introduction of the Maps and Navigation types can be found in the Maps and Navigation tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 它基于QML定位API中的API概念和类型。在“ 地图和导航”教程中可以找到有关“地图”和“导航”类型的更多动手介绍。

trans-unit.source: It calculates bounding rectangles with rect().
trans-unit.target: 它使用rect（）计算边界矩形。

trans-unit.source: It can also be controlled with the pause() and resume() methods.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用pause（）和resume（）方法进行控制。

trans-unit.source: It can also be controlled with the start() and stop() methods.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用start（）和stop（）方法进行控制。

trans-unit.source: It can also be helpful to build Qt Image Formats as this module provides support for additional texture formats.
It can also be used on other platforms, where it will fall back to using QFileDialog.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以在其他平台上使用，而在后面可以使用QFileDialog。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used to manage variables that are temporarily set, such as reentrancy guards. By using this class, the variable will be reset whether the function is exited normally, exited early by a return statement, or exited by an exception.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以用来管理临时设置的变量,比如重入守护。通过使用这个类,无论函数正常退出、被返回语句提前退出,还是被异常退出,变量都会被重置。

trans-unit.source: It can also be useful for C++ integration, as it is just a plain QObject. See the QObject documentation for further details.
trans-unit.target: 它对C ++集成也很有用，因为它只是一个普通的QObject。有关更多详细信息，请参见QObject文档。

trans-unit.source: It can always be overridden on a per-instance basis by using the class in question's own setFormat() function. However, it is often more convenient to set the format for all windows once at the start of the application. It also guarantees proper behavior in cases where shared contexts are required, because settings the format via this function guarantees that all contexts and surfaces, even the ones created internally by Qt, will use the same format.
trans-unit.target: 它总是可以通过使用相关类自己的setFormat()函数在每个实例的基础上被重写。然而,通常在应用程序开始时为所有窗口设置一次格式更为方便。它也保证了在需要共享上下文的情况下的正确行为,因为通过这个函数设置格式可以保证所有的上下文和曲面,即使是Qt内部创建的,也会使用相同的格式。

trans-unit.source: It can be a JS array of JS arrays of points constructed with Qt.point(), a QList or QVector of QPolygonF, or QVector<QVector<QPointF>>. If you are binding this to a custom property in some C++ object, QVector<QPolygonF> or QVector<QVector<QPointF>> is the most appropriate type to use.

It can be a JS array of points constructed with Qt.point(), a QList or QVector of QPointF, or QPolygonF. If you are binding this to a custom property in some C++ object, QPolygonF is the most appropriate type to use.

It can be accessed through QtAudioEngine::AudioEngine::samples with its unique name and must be defined inside AudioEngine or be added to it using AudioEngine.addAudioSample() if AudioSample is created dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过QtAudioEngine :: AudioEngine :: samples以其唯一名称进行访问，并且必须在AudioEngine内进行定义，或者如果AudioSample是动态创建的，则必须使用AudioEngine.addAudioSample（）将其添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: It can be accessed through QtAudioEngine::AudioEngine::samples with its unique name and must be defined inside AudioEngine or be added to it using AudioEngine.addAudioSample() if AudioSample is created dynamically.

trans-unit.source: It can be constructed by calling QTextLayout::glyphs() or QTextFragment::glyphs(). The returned QGlyphs objects will contain QRawFont objects which represent the actual fonts used to render each portion of the text.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用QTextLayout :: glyphs（）或QTextFragment :: glyphs（）来构造它。返回的QGlyphs对象将包含QRawFont对象，这些对象表示用于呈现文本各部分的实际字体。

trans-unit.source: It can be constructed by calling QTextLayout::glyphs() or QTextFragment::glyphs(). The returned QGlyphs objects will contain QRawFont objects which represent the actual fonts used to render each portion of the text.

It can be constructed by passing a QFont object to QRawFont::fromFont(). The function will return a QRawFont object representing the font that will be selected as response to the QFont query and the selected writing system.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将QFont对象传递到QRawFont :: fromFont（）来构造它。该函数将返回一个QRawFont对象，该对象表示将被选择作为对QFont查询和所选书写系统的响应的字体。

trans-unit.source: It can be constructed by passing a QFont object to QRawFont::fromFont(). The function will return a QRawFont object representing the font that will be selected as response to the QFont query and the selected writing system.

It can be constructed by passing a file name or QByteArray directly to the QRawFont constructor, or by calling loadFromFile() or loadFromData(). In this case, the font will not be registered in QFontDatabase, and it will not be available as part of regular font selection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将文件名或QByteArray直接传递给QRawFont构造函数，或调用loadFromFile（）或loadFromData（）来构造它。在这种情况下，该字体将不会在QFontDatabase中注册，并且不能作为常规字体选择的一部分。

trans-unit.source: It can be constructed by passing a file name or QByteArray directly to the QRawFont constructor, or by calling loadFromFile() or loadFromData(). In this case, the font will not be registered in QFontDatabase, and it will not be available as part of regular font selection.
It can be divided up into four frames:

trans-unit.source: It can be made movable again, for instance in the case of flat lists without a tree structure, by calling this method. In such a scenario, it is recommended to call QTreeView::setRootIsDecorated(false) as well.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此方法，可以使它再次可移动，例如在没有树形结构的平面列表的情况下。在这种情况下，建议也调用QTreeView :: setRootIsDecorated（false）。

trans-unit.source: It can be set directly in script, for example if a KeyProxy might forward keys to it and you desire it to look active when this happens (but without actually giving it active focus).
trans-unit.target: 它可以直接在脚本中设置,例如,如果一个KeyProxy可能会将键转发给它,而你希望它在这种情况下看起来是活动的(但实际上没有给它活动的焦点)。

trans-unit.source: It can be set to any Item type, but is generally used with StatusBar.
trans-unit.target: 可以将其设置为任何Item类型，但通常与StatusBar一起使用。

trans-unit.target: 可以将其设置为任何Item类型，但通常与ToolBar一起使用。

trans-unit.source: It can be set to specify the type of audio being played when the backend supports audio roles unknown to Qt. Specifying a role allows the system to make appropriate decisions when it comes to volume, routing or post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 当后台支持Qt未知的音频角色时,可以设置它来指定播放的音频类型。指定一个角色可以让系统在音量、路由或后处理方面做出适当的决定。

trans-unit.source: It can be set to specify the type of audio being played, allowing the system to make appropriate decisions when it comes to volume, routing or post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 它可以被设置为指定正在播放的音频类型,使系统在音量、路由或后期处理方面做出适当的决定。

It can move any number of times between inactive and active. When an item is activated, it's visible on the screen and is considered to be the current item. An item in a StackView that is not visible is not activated, even if the item is currently the top-most item in the stack. When the stack becomes visible, the item that is top-most gets activated. Likewise if the stack is then hidden, the topmost item would be deactivated. Popping the item off the top of the stack at this point would not result in further deactivation since the item is not active.
trans-unit.target: 它可以在无效和有效之间移动任意次数。激活一个项目后，它在屏幕上可见，并被视为当前项目。即使当前是堆栈中最顶层的项目，StackView中不可见的项目也不会被激活。当堆栈变为可见时，最顶部的项目将被激活。同样，如果然后隐藏堆栈，则将停用最顶层的项目。此时，将项目从堆栈顶部弹出不会导致进一步的停用，因为该项目未处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: It is almost never necessary to explicitly grab the keyboard in Qt, as Qt grabs and releases it sensibly. In particular, Qt grabs the keyboard when your item gains input focus, and releases it when your item loses input focus, or when the item is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt中几乎不需要明确地抓取键盘,因为Qt会合理地抓取和释放键盘。特别是,当你的项目获得输入焦点时,Qt会抓住键盘,而当你的项目失去输入焦点或项目被隐藏时,Qt会释放键盘。

trans-unit.source: It is almost never necessary to explicitly grab the mouse in Qt, as Qt grabs and releases it sensibly. In particular, Qt grabs the mouse when you press a mouse button, and keeps the mouse grabbed until you release the last mouse button. Also, Qt::Popup widgets implicitly call grabMouse() when shown, and ungrabMouse() when hidden.
trans-unit.target: 几乎从来没有必要在Qt中显式地抓住鼠标，因为Qt会明智地抓住并释放它。尤其是，当您按下鼠标按钮时，Qt会抓住鼠标，并保持抓住鼠标，直到释放最后一个鼠标按钮为止。此外，Qt的::弹出窗口小部件隐含调用grabMouse（）时表示，和ungrabMouse（）时隐时现。
